text: @TaxReformExpert @realDonaldTrump No blaming Covid-19 & late actions by this admin? That's the reason! Hey- @TaxReformExpert if there is a swift rise in cases, before it's controlled, will YOU be at the bedside and take care of these people who's right it was to go out?  I'm sure you could face death like we do!
